replace.title: Ersetzen
replace.text: This list entry cannot be deleted due to consistency issues. It needs to be replaced by another entry.
replace.text2: Will be replaced with this entry:
tools.main.description:
In this tab you have access to tools to work on the database and analyze it.
These tools make use of the entire database. This might lead to bad performance/ waiting times.
tools.duplicates.confirmMessage: With this you confirm that these receipts are no duplicates. This saves a hint with that they will not appear anymore as duplicates in future searches.
tools.duplicates.hint: Please be aware, that this list and view does NOT update itself after changes in other tabs!
